messages.subject: great movies
messages.msgSnippet: One of my all time favorite movies is Rudy. No matter how many times I see it, I cry at the end every time. I ts a must for all my kids to see at a certain
messages.messageBody:
One of my all time favorite movies is Rudy. No matter how many times I see
it, I cry at the end every time. I'ts a must for all my kids to see at a
certain point in time! True story too.

Another favorite is My Cousin Vinny. Totally different kind of movie but a
classis in my eyes none the less. I actually watched this one while Joseph
was being born. Even the Dr. kept turning around to see what was going on!!!

Mary B
